A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a sad day for Star Wars fans! Today\, our own Superman was destroyed and given a terrible script. What a way to deconstruct the greatest Jedi character. And if you include that 45 minute subplot with Finn\, Rose and Benicio that achieved nothing plus the throne room scene repeating elements from Episode VI\, or Leia à la Starlord or Maz Kanata with her jetpack plus Laura Dern's useless subplot. What a missed opportunity!
